title: Sample Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 2 eggs, 1 cup chocolate chips
steps:
1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F
2. Mix dry ingredients
3. Cream butter and sugar
4. Add eggs and mix
5. Fold in chocolate chips
6. Bake for 10-12 minutes

title: Sample Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 1 lb spaghetti, 4 eggs, 1 cup parmesan cheese, 6 slices bacon, black pepper
steps:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package directions
2. Cook bacon until crispy
3. Mix eggs and cheese
4. Toss hot pasta with bacon
5. Add egg mixture and toss quickly
6. Season with black pepper
